body_html:
i got tensorflow compile using the right sources.

i used this branch :

https://github.com/lukeiwanski/tensorflow/tree/dev/amd_gpu

checking it with

git checkout dev/amd_gpu

and Bazel 0.11.1

https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/download/0.11.1/bazel_0.11.1-linux-x86_64.deb

body:
i got tensorflow compile using the right sources.

 i used this branch :

> https://github.com/lukeiwanski/tensorflow/tree/dev/amd_gpu

checking it with 

> git checkout dev/amd_gpu

and Bazel 0.11.1

> https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/download/0.11.1/bazel_0.11.1-linux-x86_64.deb
